languages.text: "Полагаю, вам следует вновь выйти замуж? Я прикажу своим людям подобрать для вас лучшую партию".

traits.locale_text: "Полагаю, вам следует вновь выйти замуж? Я прикажу своим людям подобрать для вас лучшую партию".

languages.text: "I suppose you must remarry, then? I shall have my people select the best spouse for you."
languages.original_text: "Полагаю, вам следует вновь выйти замуж? Я прикажу своим людям подобрать для вас лучшую партию".

traits.locale_text: "I suppose you must remarry, then? I shall have my people select the best spouse for you."
"I suppose you must remarry, then? I shall have my people select the best spouse for you."
"I suppose you must remarry, then? I shall have my people select the best spouse for you."
"I suppose you must remarry, then? I shall have my people select the best spouse for you."

languages.text: “那我猜，你是打算续弦，是吧？我会让我的人替你物色最出色的配偶。”
languages.original_text: "I suppose you must remarry, then? I shall have my people select the best spouse for you."

traits.locale_text: “那我猜，你是打算续弦，是吧？我会让我的人替你物色最出色的配偶。”

languages.text: «Tendrá que volver a casarse, entonces. Haré que mi gente encuentre a la mejor pareja posible para usted».
languages.original_text: "I suppose you must remarry, then? I shall have my people select the best spouse for you."

traits.locale_text: «Tendrá que volver a casarse, entonces. Haré que mi gente encuentre a la mejor pareja posible para usted».

languages.text: 「それでは再婚してはどうだ？{mf|俺|私}の臣下に、お前の生涯の伴侶を選ばせてやろう」
languages.original_text: "I suppose you must remarry, then? I shall have my people select the best spouse for you."

traits.locale_text: 「それでは再婚してはどうだ？{mf|俺|私}の臣下に、お前の生涯の伴侶を選ばせてやろう」

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, il va falloir songer à vous remarier. Mes gens se chargeront de vous trouver le meilleur parti possible. »
languages.original_text: "I suppose you must remarry, then? I shall have my people select the best spouse for you."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, il va falloir songer à vous remarier. Mes gens se chargeront de vous trouver le meilleur parti possible. »

languages.text: "Dann müsst Ihr wohl wieder heiraten, oder? Ich lasse meine Leute den geeignetsten Gatten für Euch suchen."
languages.original_text: "I suppose you must remarry, then? I shall have my people select the best spouse for you."

traits.locale_text: "Dann müsst Ihr wohl wieder heiraten, oder? Ich lasse meine Leute den geeignetsten Gatten für Euch suchen."

languages.text: "O hâlde yeniden evlenmen mi lazım? Adamlarıma söyleyeyim de sana uygun bir eş bulsunlar."
languages.original_text: "I suppose you must remarry, then? I shall have my people select the best spouse for you."

traits.locale_text: "O hâlde yeniden evlenmen mi lazım? Adamlarıma söyleyeyim de sana uygun bir eş bulsunlar."
